text_section_content.markdown_text: Product selections from Costco's buying team

Regular oil changes may improve your engine's performance, extend its longevity and help your vehicle achieve its peak gas mileage. Keep up on maintenance with our selection of motor oils, which were developed to reduce wear on critical parts and maximize fuel economy. Choose from full synthetic 5W-30, 5W-20 and 0W-20 options, along with Heavy Duty Diesel 15W-40 (available in warehouses only), depending on your engine's required viscosity grade. [Various item numbers](/CatalogSearch?dept=All&keyword=kirkland+signature+motor+oil), pack sizes and quarts per container. Select warehouses/Costco.com.*Keri Ries*

costco_url.title: Kirkland Signature Pt Cat Food Variety Pack

markdown_text.markdown_text: **Kirkland Signature Pt Cat Food Variety Pack**

Our pets deserve the very best. Give your cat variety with 15 chicken, 15 turkey and 15 salmon wet food meals, which feature animal protein as the first ingredient. The 3.5-ounce servings do not contain any artificial flavors, colors or preservatives, and are free of corn, wheat and soy. [Item 1647381.](https://www.costco.com/.product.1647381.html) Warehouses/Costco.com.*Angie Nowosielski*

entry.title: Kirkland Signature Pt Cat Food Variety Pack - 1759225196943

costco_url.title: Kirkland Signature Organic House Decaf Coffee K-Cup Pods, 120-count

markdown_text.markdown_text: **Kirkland Signature Organic House Decaf Coffee K-Cup Pods, 120-count**

Do you love the taste of coffee but want to skip the caffeine? Kirkland Signature Organic House Decaf Coffee K-Cup Pods are made with 100% organic Arabica coffee. Just pop one in your Keurig coffee maker for a cup of delicious, medium roast coffee. I love to brew a cup in the afternoon when I'm craving the taste of coffee, but it's too late in the day for the caffeine. [Item 4054240.](https://www.costco.com/.product.4054240.html) Costco.com only.*Trisha Carroll*
